name: Orest Maryniuk
about: Fullstack Developer with around 3 years of hands-on experience in web development.

I started my career as a frontend developer and worked mostly with React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I was responsible for building user interfaces, integrating APIs, and improving performance across multiple projects. Over time, I became confident in creating clean, scalable UI architecture from scratch.

About a year ago, I began actively working on backend tasks as well — building REST APIs, handling data processing, and integrating third-party services using Node.js and Express. Since then, I’ve taken on fullstack responsibilities, delivering end-to-end features and collaborating closely with both frontend and backend teams.

I am comfortable working independently or in a team, and I am always focused on achieving results that meet real user needs. I am constantly learning and improving my skills in both front-end and back-end development.
I’m looking for an environment that supports growth and gives me the opportunity to develop both my technical and product skills.

experience.title: Fullstack Developer
description: Helped build, improve, and support web applications used in production.
Created frontend architecture for new projects using React, Next.js, and TypeScript, focusing on speed and scalability.
Improved performance by reducing page load time, using techniques like lazy loading, server-side rendering.
Suggested and implemented improvements in the codebase, including refactoring.
Worked closely with designers and backend developers to build a smooth user experience and connect with APIs.
Took part in planning, estimating tasks, and making technical decisions

experience.title: Fullstack Developer
description: Developed new features and supported existing parts of the system.
Worked with clients and project managers to understand business needs.
Wrote logic to process data, connected with internal services and sent data outside.
Improved service performance, fixed bugs, and made the system more stable.
Created MDVR service: processed photos/videos, tracked transport, connected telemetry.
Worked closely with other developers and analysts in the team.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
description: Developed the frontend part of the Glowly AI product from scratch using React and Next.js, ensuring high performance and user-friendliness.
Collaborated with the design team to create UX/UI solutions that enhance the user experience.
Worked closely with the backend team to integrate various APIs, ensuring the stable and scalable operation of the system.
Was the sole developer during the initial stages of the project, responsible for the architecture and functionality of the frontend part.
Utilized tools for testing and performance monitoring to ensure high code quality.

education.title: Accounting and Analysis
education.description: Дипломна робота: система керування навчальним процесом

courses.title: Full Stack Developer
courses.description: Completed a year-long course where I gained fundamental knowledge in programming and web development, which became the foundation for my further professional growth.
